articles.title: COVID-19 vaccines go to Oregon hospital employees who don't have contact with patients - KGW.com
articles.description: Some have questioned why hospital marketing employees and administrators have been vaccinated despite guidelines that put patient-facing employees first.
articles.content:
The state of Oregons plan all along was to vaccinate health care workers first, the people who come in contact with patients and are most at-risk of getting COVID-19.
